plot: In 1935 the Red Army educates a Buyi minority village in class struggle and set up a self defense militia to oppose a local strongman and the Nationalists.
title: Shan zai huo zhong
plot_es: In 1935 the Red Army educates a Buyi minority village in class struggle and set up a self defense militia to oppose a local strongman and the Nationalists.
plot_en: In 1935 the Red Army educates a Buyi minority village in class struggle and set up a self defense militia to oppose a local strongman and the Nationalists.
